title: The effects of oxygen flow ratio on the properties of AgxO thin films grown by radio frequency magnetron sputtering
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,23215-23224
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02039A, Paper
Open Access

Xiaojiao Liu, Tatsuya Yasuoka, Giang T. Dang, Li Liu, Toshiyuki Kawaharamura
When silver oxide was deposited using sputtering, its color changed depending on the oxygen supplied amount. How would the oxygen flow ratio affect the properties of AgxO thin films prepared by radio frequency magnetron sputtering?
